recommendations: Aaron Haynes
Holistic Inbound Marketing | SEO | SEM | SMM. Founder & Principal At Fenix Pro | Enterprise Level SEO Analyst
October 15, 2015, Aaron worked with Matei Gavril - but at different companies

The Digital Marketing and PR landscape online is filled with redundancy and a lot of low quality offerings.  It can be hard to stand out and bring something new, fresh, or valuable to clients and the industry in general.  Matei and PR Media Online do just this.  Matei's connections and knowledge of the high-end online publishing and journalist industry allows him to provide opportunities and connections for those seeking to gain maximum exposure for their business and brand.Matei will work to naturally and effectively match your business with the best premium publisher possible to ensure top level exposure, traffic, social sharing, and overall notoriety.  This is content marketing and PR at it's best and via channels that are only available to a select few.I highly recommend PR Media Online for any premium publisher placement needs.
Aaron Haynes

October 14, 2015, Matei Gavril - worked with Aaron but at different companies

Aaron has all of the right skills when it comes to professional SEO. I do not hesitate to recommend Aaron to anyone for his SEO skills and consulting - whether for technical audits, strategy, or content marketing and link development. He does the work on time and often ahead of schedule, while going above and beyond to achieve the most impactful results. Aaron's strong communication ability is one of the reasons our business relationships has continued past the original scope of work. He is a high-end marketer who has a wonderful combination of expertise and being down to earth - making him a pleasure to work with.

summary: The Nomad Community is the world’s first Digital Nomad platform that is built inside the Ethereum Blockchain.We have created a decentralized fully autonomous platform for the remote worker community. Building an economy that will disrupt an industry that is growing at a tremendous rate. We are providing a robust network on top of the Ethereum Blockchain that lets everyone utilize the services and at the same time share in the growth of the underlying currency and economic model.Inside our platform you will find everything you need to live and work as a Digital Nomad or Remote Worker. Our platform is underpinned by our Digital Currency: The NomadCoin (DNX). All the financial transactions on this platform are maintained on the blockchain and therefore safe and transparent for everyone.
